db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The SystemTrayIcon type provides an icon for an application in the system tray.

db:section.db:title: Availability
db:section.db:para: A native system tray icon is currently available on the following platforms:

db:listitem.db:para: All window managers and independent tray implementations for X11 that implement the freedesktop.org XEmbed system tray specification.
All desktop environments that implement the freedesktop.org D-Bus StatusNotifierItem specification, including recent versions of KDE and Unity.
All supported versions of macOS. Note that the Growl notification system must be installed for showMessage() to display messages on OS X prior to 10.8 (Mountain Lion).

db:section.db:para: The Qt Labs Platform module uses Qt Widgets as a fallback on platforms that do not have a native implementation available. Therefore, applications that use types from the Qt Labs Platform module should link to QtWidgets and use QApplication instead of QGuiApplication.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] available : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the system tray is available.

db:section.db:title: [since Qt.labs.platform 1.1 (Qt 5.12)] geometry : rect
db:section.db:para: This property holds the geometry of the system tray icon.
This property was introduced in Qt.labs.platform 1.1 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: icon group
db:section.db:para: This property holds the system tray icon.
This QML property was introduced in Qt.labs.platform 1.1 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: menu : Menu
db:section.db:para: This property holds a menu for the system tray icon.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] supportsMessages : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the system tray icon supports notification messages.

db:section.db:title: tooltip : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the tooltip of the system tray icon.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the system tray icon is visible.
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: activated(ActivationReason reason)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the system tray icon is activated by the user. The reason argument specifies how the system tray icon was activated.
Available reasons:

db:td.db:para: The context menu for the system tray icon was requested
The system tray icon was double clicked
The system tray icon was clicked
The system tray icon was clicked with the middle mouse button

db:section.db:title: messageClicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when a notification message is clicked by the user.

db:section.db:title: void hide()
db:section.db:para: Hides the system tray icon.

db:section.db:title: void show()
db:section.db:para: Shows the system tray icon.

db:section.db:title: void showMessage(string title, string message, MessageIcon icon, int msecs)
db:section.db:para: Shows a system tray message with the given title, message and icon for the time specified in msecs.

db:note.db:para: System tray messages are dependent on the system configuration and user preferences, and may not appear at all. Therefore, it should not be relied upon as the sole means for providing critical information.
